mainEntity.name: What are NFTs and how do they work?

acceptedAnswer.text: An introductory article from The Verge explaining the basics of NFTs. [Read more](https://www.theverge.com/22310188/nft-explainer-what-is-blockchain-crypto-art-faq).

mainEntity.name: What is the environmental impact of NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: A Wired article discussing the environmental concerns associated with NFT transactions. [Read more](https://www.wired.com/story/nfts-hot-new-crypto-hype-is-straining-earths-energy-supply/).

mainEntity.name: What is the cultural impact of memes?

acceptedAnswer.text: A Time piece examining memes' influential role in pop culture. [Read more](https://time.com/5795434/memes-the-importance-of-their-place-in-pop-culture/).

mainEntity.name: Who are the accidental ghostwriters of the meme economy?

acceptedAnswer.text: A New Yorker article focusing on individuals behind popular memes and their unexpected foray into the NFT market. [Read more](https://www.newyorker.com/tech/annals-of-technology/the-accidental-ghostwriter-of-the-meme-economy).

mainEntity.name: What are the economic implications of digital collectibles?

acceptedAnswer.text: Forbes discusses the economic potential of NFTs as digital assets in the marketplace. [Read more](https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbestechcouncil/2021/02/26/the-nft-explosion/?sh=10b5e4392e05).
